mapper.update: update application_inf set attend_id = #{attend.id}, app_reason = #{reason}, app_result = #{result}, type_id = #{type.id} where app_id = #{id};
mapper.select: select app.*, type.* from application_inf app join attend_inf attend on app.attend_id = attend.attend_id join attend_type_inf type on app.type_id = type.type_id where app.app_id = #{id};
